high_descs: Cross the room and face the dresser in the corner with the lamp.
Pick the disc up from in front of the lamp on the dresser.
Move to the left and face the lamp on the dresser.
Turn the lamp on the dresser on.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a disc and turn the lamp on.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the bed, then turn left and walk to the window, then turn right to face the dresser.
Pick up the cd from the left side of the dresser.
Turn left and look at the window then turn right and face the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the corner of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Look at a cd under the light of a lamp.

high_descs: turn left and walk towards the bed turn left and walk towards the door turn right and turn towards the dresser then turn left towards the door turn right and walk forward towards the dresser
pick up the cd on the left
turn to your left then back to the dresser
anns.task_desc: pick up the cd and turn on the lamp on the dresser
